The 'Active Citizen Project (ACP)', is a New York City-based non-profit
organization founded in 2003 by filmmaker Linda Goode Bryant in response to the
2004 U.S. presidential election. Throughout the United States, ACP engages high
school students in internet activism using art and new media.
categories: Non-profit organizations based in New York City
